entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Allow services to be exported per language server #61002
  • Getting projects from a solution (old vs. sdk style csproj) #60996
  • Code Cleanup option to Fix all warnings and errors set in EditorConfig #60994
    17.3
  • IImplementInterfaceService is implemented by calling a code action, but it should be the other way around #60990
  • IDE0057 drops `checked` and `unchecked` modifiers for range simplification #60988
  • EditorConfig UI should have an option to add a file header #60987
  • sort usings should be apart of code cleanup #60986
  • Typo in Code Cleanup UI #60985
  • Create Find-References API overload that allows searching for references to multiple symbols at once. #60984
  • Attempting bulk suppression using source code attribute in document doesn't suppress anything and silently fails #60983
    Backlog
  • [C# 9] IDE0017 is not shown for short constructor call #60982
    Backlog
  • C# VS 2022 Code Style | Formatting | Spacing not properly applying options #60981
    Backlog
  • Roslyn null refs in RuleSetEventHandler.Unregister #60980
    17.3
  • [Documentation] .NET Compiler Platform SDK link is invalid and just redirects to Bing #60978

Closed

  • IMethodSymbol doesn't have IsNew #60790
  • Incorrect define constant use in BuildServerConnection.cs #60553
    17.3
  • Verify changes to ConvertOnEnum test #60765
  • Verify change to ConstantValueToStringTest01 test #60767
  • The name of the generated event handler is invalid for generics classes. #59935
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in PdbSourceDocumentLoaderService.cs line 130 #60908

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for LSP semantic token refresh. #61003
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust timeout on helix runs to 15 minutes to ensure dumps are captur… #61001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 'RelaxingShiftOperator' into 'main' #61000
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.2 #60999
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #60995
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [LSP] Remove semantic tokens IsFinalized logic #60993
    LSP
  • Add support to inheritance margin to disambiguate same-named items. #60992
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Send semantic tokens refresh notifications when compilations are available #60991
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.3 #60998
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, auto-merge
  • Forbid types with required members from substituting for where T : new() #60788
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't initialize the StackTraceExplorer tool window until it is invoked #60973
    Area-IDE, Next
  • insert into main for 17.3 before VS snap #60997
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge "extended nameof scope" feature #60770
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Move the load of project completion providers to background #60950
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #60881
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Allow non-Roslyn languages to use Formatter API #60971
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update main to generate draft insertions #60989
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix exceptions for non-VS hosting of Roslyn #60979
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' into RelaxingShiftOperator #60972
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Simplify implementation of the "remove 'this' or 'me'" analyzer/fixer. #60966
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60970
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Delete unused RPC streaming code from our OOP impl. #60974
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable .Net Core OOP by default #60163
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Portable to 1.7.0-beta-21315-03 #54131
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.3
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #53386
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Blocked, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.3
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
